name: python number guess (Python 3.9 not included)
description:
a free, simple, open source game based of guessing a random number with many secrets, sarcastic comments and gamemodes. i know you are gonna go through the code anyways to find stuff, i'm not that dumb. i'm defos gonna update it when i get a chance. python is required btw so here is a link to download it Download Python | Python.org 

a modding engine will be added in future updates, also being a teenage developer, the game has been updated from class and home (for nobody than wondered why the hell it is in Beta 1.3)
